short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension that opens a random tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A "Tab Roulette" feature that sequentially activates the browser tabs the user currently has open, cycling through them for a set amount of time, until one tab is randomly selected to remain active.

Bet icons created by Freepik - Flaticon
